subject: Network management: 5 key 2022 trends
text:
The latest white papers, case studies and product information
 
Business Technology Research     August 17, 2022
IN THIS ISSUE
Network management: 5 key 2022 trends
Network management: 5 key 2022 trends
SPONSORED BY: Turbonomic an IBM company
96% of corporate networks have or will have IoT devices and sensors connecting to them, according to an EMA Research Report of 409 IT professional survey respondents. Open this report to uncover key recommendations for resolving today’s network modernization challenges.
Read More

subject: Industrial IoT: Expanding your application ecosystem
text:
The latest white papers, case studies and product information
 
Business Technology Research     July 27, 2022
IN THIS ISSUE
Industrial IoT: Expanding your application ecosystem
Industrial IoT: Expanding your application ecosystem
SPONSORED BY: Siemens
While building personalized apps for specific business use cases can provide great advantages, it can be extremely hard to do without the right tools and services. Read on to learn how Mendix’s all-in-one low-code platform can help your organization improve the value of your industrial IoT implementation with applications specific to your needs.

subject: =?UTF-8?B?VGl0dXMsIHNlY3VyaXR5IGFuZCBjb25maWRlbnRpYWxpdHku?=
text:
Your privacy,
secured


Security and privacy are not
just features, they're in our DNA-baked
into the core of Galaxy. Explore the
amazing ways Samsung Knox protects
your digital world.



 
Certified
heist proof


Protect your world with Knox Vault,
the secure spot-built into every
Galaxy device-that stores your
private data. It's every hacker’s
worst nightmare.


SEE ALL ACTION >



           

   
To our valued customers

As we continue to navigate these uncertain times, the health and well-being of our customers are our top priority. As such, we’re always taking steps to both protect and serve you online at Samsung.com with round-the-clock chat on Samsung Members, Facebook Messenger and Twitter. You can reach us by phone at 0800 545 545.


Legal |Privacy Policy

This email has been sent to members who have requested to join the mailing list.
If you wish to unsubscribe from this mailing list, please click Unsubscribe.
